description: Rikichi is a humble farmer who accompanies http://anidb.net/ch3961 [Kirara] and http://anidb.net/ch3949 [Komachi] into the city in the search for the Samurai. Rikichi is the first villager to suggest that they defend themselves against the bandits, fallen samurai who turned into stealing the villages` crop and women. It is his farmer`s resolve that gives him the strength to serve as Kirara`s guide and protector. Rikichi is also in charge of carrying the rice that the village plans to use as payment for the services of the samurai they hire.
name: Rikichi
